snippet: Karen Handel’s resignation came just days after the cancer foundation reversed its decision to cut funds to Planned Parenthood.
abstract: Karen Handel resigns as senior vice president for policy of the Susan G Komen for the Cure foundation after it reverses its decision to largely end its financial support for breast cancer screenings at Planned Parenthood affiliates amid public uproar.
lead_paragraph: Karen Handel’s resignation came just days after the cancer foundation reversed its decision to cut funds to Planned Parenthood.

headline.seo: After Outcry, Karen Handel Resigns From Komen
headline.main: After Outcry, a Senior Official Resigns at Komen
headline.print_headline: After Reversal, Official at Breast Cancer Foundation Resigns

keywords.value: Komen, Susan G, for the Cure
keywords.name: organizations
